name: Code Guide
description: 编写一致、灵活和可持续的 HTML 和 CSS 代码的规范。

name: LeetCode
description: LeetCode is the best platform to help you enhance your skills, expand your knowledge and prepare for technical interviews.

description: Powerful coding training system. LintCode has the most interview problems covering Google, Facebook, Linkedin, Amazon, Microsoft and so on.

name: Topcoder

name: AtCoder
description: AtCoder is a programming contest site for anyone from beginners to experts. We hold weekly programming contests online.

name: Codewars
description: Sharpen your skills. Get instant feedback. Earn ranks and honor. Tap into the collective wisdom.
